CustomField.description: Used to check if the Status_WO_SA field on the FSL mobile app should be used to Sync the status of Work Orders & Service Appointments or not
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, Changing the status of the Status or Status (WO/SA) fields on the Service Appointment will not sync the status of a WO & SA
CustomField.label: Status UnSync (WO/SA)
